title: Rukmini Iyer’s trio of summer salads: chicken, butter beans and feta
description:
The Roasting Tin author on three ways to add colour and crunch to your summer feasting table

These recipes highlight that a few good ingredients need little more than a simple dressing to shine.

In all three, the star ingredient – from my favourite Navarrico jarred butter beans to free-range chicken and good feta cheese – has a short stint marinating in a herby lemon and olive oil dressing before stirring it through with a handful of complementary ingredients.
